definition: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (1956-), Iranian fundamentalist politician, president of Iran 2005-2013/abbr. for 艾哈邁迪內賈德|艾哈迈迪内贾德
Jia Qinglin (1940-), member of the Politburo Standing Committee 2002-2012
Jia Baoyu, male character in The Dream of Red Mansions, in love with his cousin Lin Daiyu 林黛玉 but obliged to marry Xue Baochai 薛寶釵|薛宝钗
Jia Yi (200-168 BC), Chinese poet and statesman of the Western Han Dynasty
Jiawang district of Xuzhou city 徐州市[Xu2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
Ahmadinejad or Ahmadinezhad (Persian name)/Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (1956-), Iranian fundamentalist politician, president of Iran 2005-2013
pinyin: Ai4 ha1 mai4 di2 nei4 jia3 de2

sentences.english: Janice evaded Minmei's embrace, and nodded coolly.
sentences.chinese: 贾妮斯避开了她的拥抱礼，冷淡地点点头致意。

sentences.english: His final breakthrough came when he obtained a copy of a manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 贾维斯最终在一份手稿上的复印件上找到了突破口。

sentences.english: A spokeswoman for Mr. Rajaratnam's legal team declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 拉贾拉特南律师团的一位发言人拒绝置评。

sentences.english: Right now he is working in Beijing on a project titled "Karibu Islands".
sentences.chinese: 今年他在北京进行的项目叫做“贾里布群岛”。

sentences.english: "Where?" Janice asked, walking over to him.
The Gu way grows startled disgrace, body quickly the Zong jumped behind outside of circle.
sentences.chinese: 贾道长愕然失色，身子急忙后纵跳出了圈外。

sentences.english: Jarvis says this definition is too tidy.
sentences.chinese: 贾维斯说，这种定义太过简单化。

sentences.english: But for Jared, wealth and living standards have diverged.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于贾里德，财富和生活水平已经背离了。

sentences.english: Giacomo reclaims his daughter, and the King professes his love.
sentences.chinese: 贾科莫回收他的女儿，国王自称他的爱。

sentences.english: Thanks to Jostein Risa for the translation.
sentences.chinese: 由于乔斯坦贾德里沙的翻译。

sentences.english: "Janice, " Minmei said, approaching her former partner.
sentences.chinese: “贾妮斯，”明美朝着她之前的搭档走过去。

sentences.english: Play as Alex and Justin by serving customers in the Waverly Sub Station.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯和贾斯汀扮演的韦弗利子站的客户服务。

sentences.english: The cover star of this issue is Justin, my favorite singer.
sentences.chinese: 这期的封面明星是贾斯汀，我最喜欢的歌手。

sentences.english: But Jagoe thinks the services will prevail eventually.
sentences.chinese: 不过，贾戈尔认为这项服务终将流行。

sentences.english: Rajaratnam, 53, now faces 20 years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 现年53岁的拉贾拉特南将面临20年监禁。

sentences.english: Giles is a participant in his own scenario.
sentences.chinese: 贾尔斯是在他自己的方案参与者。

definition: first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
